text: Director of the film ` ` Kill Bill : Volume 1,'' Quentin Tarantino, left, and cast member Uma Thurman arrive at the premiere of the film Monday, Sept. 29, 2003, at the Grauman's Chinese Theatre in the Hollywood section of Los Angeles.
